SpyTools.main_description: A collection of spy-themed tools with unique abilities and crafting requirements.

items.name: Chimera
items.description: Hold it close for unexpected protection. Grants one-time protection against effects from other users.

items.name: Spy Briefcase
items.description: Discreetly siphon 30% of another member's points.

items.name: Key Chain Sheep
items.description: Assigns a random role to the targeted member.

items.name: Mute Muffler
items.description: Silences the target user for 30 minutes.

items.name: Motion Alarm
items.description: Single-use alarm triggers a 20-minute timeout if the target sends any emoji (checks last 10 messages).

items.name: EMP Device
items.description: Disables all active Spy Tools in the server for 10 minutes.

items.name: Scrambler
items.description: Changes the target‚Äôs nickname to random gibberish for 1 hour.

items.name: Cloaking Watch
items.description: Grants invisibility from detection tools for 15 minutes (immune to tracking or alarms).

Materials.main_description: Resources used to craft Spy Tools, each with a specific price and emoji representation.

GachaGames.main_description: Randomized games offering collectable card draws or gambling challenges for points.

items.description: Guess the dice roll outcome. Bet points to play.

PoketwoSpawns.main_description:
Customize layout and background images of Poketwo spawns in your server.

Requires one of these:
- Anya Manger (role)
- Admin (permission)
